Articles.Content: When I don't have access to KSP, I don't play the game for weeks on end. This means that I become bored, and I sometimes like to plan KSP aircraft on paper. However, not knowing the width-length proportions of certain KSP parts ( fuselages and wings) makes this a kind of guessing game. My question is: is there something out there that I can use to plan for KSP aircraft? Is there a database that shows the proportions of various stock/modded parts?
Not to my knowledge. But that would be super cool!
